ProjectTitle: A micromechanical model of load transfer across the bone-cartilage interface to evaluate osteochondral remodelling in osteoarthritis.
InitialFeedbackHistory:
20/04/2023
Documentation & Metadata:
What you describe is very generic and therefore somewhat meaningless. Consider what documentation / metadata you have that explains the meaning of your data, so other researchers can understand it too.
Your protocol is important documentation. 
Do you use a lab notebook? That provides documentation.
Consider which metadata you can export from the instruments for the microCT images and microscopy images. Often they can be exported as txt files for each image. 
Mentioning the DDI standard makes no sense - this is a metadata standard for social science research / surveys. 
Some guidance here: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/documentation-metadata
label: good with suggestions
